name: Ext_R2_StructureDefinition_base
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.StructureDefinition.base for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureDefinition.base from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Structure that this set of constraints applies to
element.definition: An absolute URI that is the base structure from which this set of constraints is derived.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.baseDefinition` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.baseDefinition`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
